The following work originates from a QR code branded to several areas within the Three Portland‚Äôs Prometheus Plaza and recently zoned Androidmeda District. It is not attributable to anyone except its eponymous signer, known only as ‚ÄúR.‚Äù

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div class="poem"]]

Girl in a business suit, I

Saw you coming out of that cafe 

A twenty dollar latte in hand

Girls like you (and forgive me if you‚Äôre not)

You fascinate me

Your cologne smears like perfume

Your shoes like a mom‚Äôs lipstick

Like a displaced Sidhe, you

March to the beat of an anonymizing drum

To the tune of a silver-spoon blare

I wonder, and I shouldn‚Äôt have

What papers you shuffle on a daily basis

Whose head is the next upon your capital‚Äôs chassis

A girl in business kind of fucks, honestly

There‚Äôs a real sense of urgency, a total harmony

Of cacophonous elements, black tie and glass paint

Paint coating a ceiling gilded to a gentrifying

Pointed sword, nasty‚Äîlike all the bitches downtown.

Those women in make-up and pink fashion

Which either disgusts you

Turns you on

Or shames you.

Girl in a business suit, 

The one with the short black hair

Are you the one we‚Äôre all gabbing about?

Someone‚Äôs making moves

That these ports can‚Äôt sustain

The Sidhes are leaving, and the golems are being 

Pulverized to dust, as the dollar moves 

And the electronica pours in

As those rich paratech babies swoop 

To override the haunts of this city

The ghost of dead steel mills

Where the plains once used to be

Among parabolic wheat, as far as the eye could see‚Äî

And yet somehow, if it is you

I‚Äôve got to admire the balls

Of someone willing to bare themselves 

In public, of all spheres too,

When the dog of merchant glory is at the door

In all its conformative glory

I can‚Äôt imagine what your office is like

Do your co-workers consider you

Just one of the guys?

Maybe someday I should take you out

And show you a real time

A proper time

Before your guilt kicks in and I‚Äôm

Thrown out like the skank your mom thinks I am
[[/div]]
